items.title: Rivian will pay $250M to settle lawsuit over R1 price hike
items.description: The three-year-old lawsuit centered on Rivian's sudden decision to increase prices on the R1 lineup in 2022, which sank the stock price.

items.title: Arbor’s ‘vegetarian rocket engine’ power plant is actually an omnivore
items.description: As demand for electricity from data centers grows, Arbor Energy has made its power plant capable of burning natural gas in addition to biomass.
